sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DEPT_ID , A.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_DEPTINFO A WHERE A.DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT DEPT_CD FROM TABLE(BSC_SYSTEM_KGS.F_V_GHF0221D_LIST(#findYear#, #findMon#)) WHERE ROLE_TC = '10' AND INSP_KIND_TC = '01' AND STIC_LAG_TC IN ('35', '36', '37') AND DEPT_CD = '3L00')

SELECT A.YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , A.RPT_TC_NM , A.ROLE_TC_NM , A.INSP_KIND_TC_NM , A.LAW_TC_NM , A.STIC_LAG_TC_NM , A.STIC_MID_TC_NM , A.INSP_QTY FROM TABLE (BSC_SYSTEM_KGS.F_V_GHF0221D_LIST(#findYear#, #findMon#)) A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID WHERE 1= 1 AND YEAR = #findYear# AND MON = #findMon# AND ROLE_TC = '10' AND INSP_KIND_TC = '01' AND STIC_LAG_TC IN ('35', '36', '37') AND DEPT_CD = '3L00' ORDER BY YEAR, MON, DEPT_CD

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM

SELECT A.DEPT_ID FROM BSC_DEPTINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE B.YEAR = #findYear#
B.SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd#
B.DEPT_ID = #findDeptId#
